title: NCAA® Football 14
description: The Games on Demand version supports English.  “Download the manual for this game by going to https://help.ea.com/en/tag/manuals and selecting your title from the Product drop down menu.”  NCAA® Football 14 unlocks the unpredictability and innovation of the college game. The new physics-driven animation system and a completely re-engineered spread and read option game influence the outcome of every moment allowing you to stay true to your team.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Recruiting Reports
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. It can take a lot of time and effort to see where your rivals are spending their Recruiting Points every week in Dynasty Mode. The Recruiting Reports will bring the information from the previous week. Knowing what your opponent is doing can help you make informed decisions while spending your Recruiting Points. This will affect every team you control in Dynasty Mode and Online Dynasty Mode.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 5 Star Defensive Back
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Your caliber coming out of the High School Playoffs in Road to Glory mode directly affects the attributes of your created player and a 5 star recruit is the best you can be. You will be able to start your college career as a 5 star Cornerback, Strong Safety, or Free Safety every time you create a player in Road to Glory mode after purchase.

You will be able to start your college career as a 5 star Defensive End or Defensive Tackle every time you create a player in Road to Glory mode after purchase.

Your caliber coming out of the High School Playoffs in Road to Glory mode directly affects the attributes of your created player and a 5 star recruit is the best you can be. You will be able to start your college career as a 5 star player in any position every time you create a player in Road to Glory after purchase.

Your caliber coming out of the High School Playoffs in Road to Glory mode directly affects the attributes of your created player and a 5 star recruit is the best you can be. You will be able to start your college career as a 5 star Halfback or Fullback every time you create a player in Road to Glory mode after purchase.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 All Dynasty Time Savers
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Unlocks all of the Dynasty Time Savers: Coaching Seminar, School Pitches Improvements, Maximum Player Training, Pipeline State Addition, and Recruiting Reports. These will affect every team you control in Dynasty Mode and Online Dynasty Mode.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Coaching Seminar
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Coaching Seminar gives you the maximum chance to keep players from leaving early. Players staying are influenced by promises you make, and with this item provides a boost to how much impact those promises have. Also this will add to the Coach Prestige grade by one level (e.g. if your Coach Prestige was an A it will become an A+). This will affect every team you control in Dynasty and Online Dynasty.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Commish Bundle (Bundle Pack C)
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. With this entitlement you gain access to Week Advance Anywhere and Commish of 5 Online Dynasties. You'll be able to run up to 5 Online Dynasties as the commissioner and be able to advance the weeks from wherever you access www.easports.com/dynasty.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Commish of 5 Online Dynasties
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. This entitlement will give you more space on the NCAA® Football 14 Online Dynasty servers which lets you control more than one Online Dynasty. You will be able to control up to maximum of 5 Online Dynasties as the commissioner with this entitlement.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 (DEMO)
childDownloads.description: NCAA® Football 14 unlocks the unpredictability and innovation of the college game. The new physics-driven animation system and a completely re-engineered spread and read option game influence the outcome of every moment allowing you to play true to your team.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Interest Grades Improvements
childDownloads.description: "Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. This item will increase your interest grades in Recruiting by one level; for example if your Television Exposure was A it will become A+. This item will improve the following pitches: Championship Contender, Pro Potential, Program Tradition, and Television Exposure. This will affect every team you control in Dynasty Mode and Online Dynasty Mode. "

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Max Coach Trust
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Get the maximum amount of coach trust to earn on field abilities like audibles, hot routes, and changing the play in the huddle.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Max Reaction Time
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Get the maximum possible reaction time by boosting your Awareness rating to 99.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Max TeamBuilder Slots
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. You’ll need TeamBuilder slots available if you want to download teams for NCAA® Football 14. This will give you a total of 120 slots to download teams for use in Play Now and Dynasty Mode. This will not add to any slots previously unlocked only give you a maximum of 120 teams.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Maximum Player Training
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. In Dynasty, players on lower prestige schools don't progress as fast as top tier programs. This item will allow a team with lower prestige to train their players like one of the top schools in the nation. In Online Dynasty, purchase before the commissioner advances to the Player Training portion of the Off-season. This will affect every team you control in Dynasty Mode and Online Dynasty Mode.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Pipeline State Addition
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. After purchase you will be able to select a Pipeline State anywhere in the nation to give you an edge in gaining the top recruits. You will only be able to select an additional Pipeline State at the beginning of the season; but it will stay active for the entire season. This will affect every team you control in Dynasty Mode and Online Dynasty Mode.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Power Pack (Bundle Pack D)
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Power up your NCAA® Football 14 experience. Included are all the Dynasty Time Savers, Road to Glory 5 Star Recruit for ALL Positions, the ability to save 120 TeamBuilder Teams, Commish of 5 Online Dynasties, Week Advance Anywhere, Max Reaction Time, Triple your XP, and Max Coach Trust.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Triple your XP
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. Improve your attributes faster by earning XP points at triple the normal rate.

childDownloads.title: NCAA FOOTBALL 14 Week Advance Anywhere
childDownloads.description: Season Ticket subscribers get 20% off all downloadable content purchased from within the game. As a commissioner in an Online Dynasty it is up to you to keep that Dynasty moving along. What better way to do that than to be able to advance the weeks for your Dynasty from anywhere you access the web? With this entitlement you will gain access to be able to advance the weeks of your Online Dynasty from www.easports.com/dynasty.
